column3: ACK 1c5474883836bcadbb7f649ef9bf95137d991e49. Tested that the contents of the `getblock` JSON response of master and this PR are equal (for two testnet blocks; one older and a recent block). The ordering of the JSON fields does change, but I don't think that's a problem. \n\nReviewers might want to use `jq -S` to sort the JSON fields alphabetically and then compare the RPC responses. Additionall
Checked the `rest/block/<hash>.json` interface too as it calls `blockToJSON()` as well.

Because it is also part of `blockheaderToJSON`, and that is also clear immediately to readers of the code in this case.\n\nBut I was thinking about whether or not to remove it myself and was not sure.  So if you think it should be there (even though it will be asserted again in `blockheaderToJSON`), I'm happy to put it back.
It looks like `height` is also set upstream?
Yes indeed, good catch!  I've removed that line as well now.
